snippet.title: Papilio - Gameplay Demo (version 0.9.3.0 beta)
snippet.description:
Papilio is currently on sale at itch.io. Please consider a purchase and help me get the game on Steam and GOG! https://s20-tbl.itch.io/papilio

I haven't uploaded much of anything concerning Papilio for several years for a number of reasons, but I feel that now is the time to reveal the current state of the game and all the changes made since 2014:

* 4 new levels, plus a hidden True Final Level
* A full-fledged Training Mode
* New enemies and bosses, including the True Last Boss and new EX bosses for stages 3 and 4
* Stronger player weapons and bombs
* General Quality of Life improvements, including modern PlayStation / Xbox controller support
